description:
This course is the basic guide to becoming a feature film or short film or content writer.

Script writing is a creative art.

The person who posseses this art and writes scripts is called as script writer.

To educate you on the art of script writing we have brought you this theoretical course.

This Theoretical Course will enable you to understand the concept of script writing by teaching you various things associated with it such as

1) What is a script?

2) Various typess of scripts.

3) Greatness of a writer ?

4) Purpose of writing and so on

Scriptwriter or Scenarist is a writer who practices the craft of screenwriting, writing screenplays on which mass media such as films, television programs, comics or video games are based.

Most professional screenwriters in the U.S. are unionized and are represented by the Writers Guild of America. Although membership in the WGA is recommended, it is not required of a screenwriter to join. The WGA is the final arbiter on awarding writing credit for projects under its jurisdiction. The WGA also looks upon and verifies film copyright materials.

A script is a document describing the narrative and dialogue of a book in detail. It is the book equivalent of a television program teleplay or a film screenplay
title: The Essential Guide To Become A Script Writer ( Theoretical)
